page.title: 08ATTITUDES
page.content:
We interviewed several people from the community to find out how they felt about living in Woodmancote and what sort of work they did.
{Mrs.J.Williams }is a native of Woodmancote and still lives in the house she was born in; the house built by her father from local stone. She remembers when the village was much smaller and she knew everyone in it.Now she sometimes gets lost among all the new houses.She still enjoys living here but does not think the sense of community is as strong. (Mrs.Williams is caretaker at the Primary school).
{Mrs.J.Macpherson-Rait }on the other hand is a very newcomer.Originally from Scotland,she has recently moved in from Cornwall. (cont.on next page)
